a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Fruit consumption by fruit type, World, 1961 to 2020
Average fruit consumption per person, differentiated by fruit types, measured in kilograms per year.
Data source: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
Note: Data is based on per capita food supply at the consumer level, but does not account for food waste at the consumer level.
